translation.en: [girl] Dear Diary...
go fuck yourself.
Just kidding. I don't know what to write in this stupid thing.
translation.es: Es broma. No sé qué escribiren esta cosa estúpida.

translation.en: Anyway, hi.
My name is Sydney.
I'm a boring 17-year-old white girl.
translation.es: Soy una chica blanca y aburridade 17 años.

translation.en: I'm not special, is what I'm trying to say,
translation.es: Lo que intento decires que no soy especial,

translation.en: and I'm okay with that.
-♪ I'm not like everybody else ♪ -We moved to Pennsylvania two years ago.
translation.es: Nos mudamos a Pensilvania hace dos años,

translation.en: And not, like, a cute part of Pennsylvania either,
translation.es: y no a una parte linda de Pensilvania,

translation.en: but corn and cabbage and shit.
translation.es: sino a maíz, repollo y mierda.

translation.en: Like, my town's won the grand prize for most polluted air in America
translation.es: Mi ciudad acaba de ganar el premioal aire más contaminado del país

translation.en: for a bunch of years in a row now, so...
-♪ 'Cause I'm not like everybody else ♪ -...yippee.
Ms. Cappriotti made me promise to do this.
translation.es: La Sra. Cappriottime hizo prometer que haría esto.

translation.en: Promise you'll do this.
She said it might help with my moods.
translation.es: Dijo que ayudaráa mi estado de ánimo.

translation.en: It might help with your moods.
translation.es: Ayudará a tu estado de ánimo.

translation.en: I keep losing my temper.
-♪ Like everybody else ♪ -I don't want to, but it just spills out.
It's 'cause my dad sort of died... last spring.
translation.es: Es porque mi padremurió la primavera pasada.

translation.en: So I'm supposed to write... what, now? I don't get it.
Anything. Everything.
Whatever comes to mind.
And now no one knows what to say to me.
translation.es: Y ahora nadie sabe qué decirme.

translation.en: Think of it like you're just talking to yourself
translation.es: Es como si estuvieras hablando sola.

translation.en: and no one will ever read it but you.
[Sydney] Not even the guidance counselor.
Can I just... use my phone?
Hmm... Your phone'll be distracting. Don't you think?
I'd like you to have something a little more...
translation.es: Me gustaría que tuvieras algoun poco más...

translation.en: therapeutic.
These things are never easy,
but I do want you to at least attempt
translation.es: pero quiero que al menos intentes

translation.en: to have a normal high school experience.
translation.es: tener una experiencia normalen la secundaria.

translation.en: I mean, she's pretty all right, I guess.
Even if she does smell like an old hippie.
Anyway, here's to a normal high school experience,
translation.es: En fin, por una experiencia normalen la secundaria,

translation.en: whatever the fuck that means.
translation.es: lo que sea que eso signifique.

translation.en: And yes, during arousal, there is an increase in all sorts of things,
translation.es: Durante la excitaciónaumentan todo tipo de cosas,

translation.en: including adrenaline and, of course, blood flow,
translation.es: incluida la adrenalinay el flujo sanguíneo.

translation.en: and the blood flow continues down
translation.es: El flujo de sangre sigue bajando

translation.en: and then gets trapped within the corpora cavernosa.
translation.es: y queda atrapadodentro de los cuerpos cavernosos.

translation.en: The penis expands, and this is how the Homo sapien male
translation.es: El pene se expande,y así es como el Homo sapiens masculino

translation.en: is able to hold an erection.
Yes.
From my experience, Mr. File,
the holding of an erection is far more successful
translation.es: tener una erección es más fácil

translation.en: in the hands of a Homo sapien female.
translation.es: si está en manosde una Homo sapiens femenina.

translation.en: Very funny, Mr. Lewis.
Just talkin' science.
Moving on.
When a female gets sexually excited, there is also increased blood flow
translation.es: Cuando una mujer se excita,también aumenta el flujo de sangre...

translation.en: -to the genitals... -Ah. Oh, come on, fire crotch.
translation.es: Cuando una mujer se excita,también aumenta el flujo de sangre... Vamos, entrepierna pelirroja, ríete.Eso fue gracioso.

translation.en: -Laugh. That was funny. -[Mr. File] ...proceeds to swell.
translation.es: Vamos, entrepierna pelirroja, ríete.Eso fue gracioso.

translation.en: Why is all this happening?
-[laughs] -Your scrotum looks different than others. That's an asymmetrical scrotum.
translation.es: Cada escroto luce diferente a los demás.Los escrotos son asimétricos.

translation.en: -[Sydney] My best friend is Dina. -Having one is not at all unusual.
[Sydney] She's such a badass.
Normally, I don't think she'd choose me as a friend,
but we both moved here around the same time.
translation.es: No seríamos amigasen otras circunstancias, pero nos mudamos aquíal mismo tiempo.

translation.en: Both the new kids in town, you know, so, guess I kinda lucked out.
translation.es: Las dos chicas nuevas en la ciudad.Supongo que tuve suerte.

translation.en: Before Dina, I mostly just kept to myself.
translation.es: Antes de Dina, no hablaba con nadie.

translation.en: I'm not the kind of person that likes attention, really,
translation.es: No soy el tipo de personaque disfruta la atención,

translation.en: but she has this way about her that...
she just makes me feel different.
She was with me when I found out about my dad.
translation.es: Estaba conmigocuando me enteré de lo de papá.

translation.en: Okay. You ready?
-She held my hand. -One, two...
We cried.
And now, since then, she keeps me laughing when all I wanna do is melt into the floor.
translation.es: Y desde entonces, ella me hace reírcuando lo único que quiero es desaparecer.

translation.en: Which sort of made me realize I've never had a best friend before.
translation.es: Eso me hizo darme cuentade que nunca había tenido una mejor amiga.

translation.en: -♪ And then I ♪ -♪ And I want it ♪ -♪ Yes, I do ♪ -♪ Yes, I do ♪
So, I'm standing there, trying to get by, and he's all like, "Oh, who's the new girl in town?"
translation.es: Estoy parada ahí tratando de pasar,y él dice: "¿Quién es la chica nueva?".

translation.en: And I'm like, "Shut up. It's me, Dina."
translation.es: Y yo le digo: "Cállate. Soy yo, Dina".

translation.en: Wait, this is Brad... Lewis?
Yeah.
He's sort of sweet, you know?
And then he asked me to homecoming.
translation.es: Y luego me invitó al baile.

translation.en: Wait, and... and you accepted?
No. I told him to take his washboard abs and chiseled jawline
translation.es: No. Le dije que tomara sus abdominalesy su mandíbula perfecta

translation.en: and get out of my face.
translation.es: y se fuera de mi vista.

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah, of course I said yes.
translation.es: Sí, claro que dije que sí.

translation.en: Uh-- Oh, my God. You had sex with him, didn't you?
-[chuckles] -Holy shit.
No way! Holy shit!
You gave Bradley Lewis your V-card?
-Tell me he used a condom, because-- -Yes, of course.
translation.es: - Dime que usó un condón, porque...- Sí, claro.

translation.en: I know.
Dina just got her braces off, and her boobs suddenly arrived.
translation.es: Dina se quitó los frenillosy sus pechos crecieron.

translation.en: So, of course, golden boy Bradley Lewis takes notice.
translation.es: Claro que el chico maravilla,Bradley Lewis, lo notaría.

translation.en: So, what, are you guys, like, suddenly girlfriend and boyfriend or something?
translation.es: ¿Y ahora son novios o algo así?

translation.en: I mean, we haven't put a label on it yet, but...
I really like him, okay?
This is the worst.
Yeah. Oh, yeah. No. Sure, I get it.
Just give him a chance.
Oh, come on, there's gotta be someone you sort of like. Just a little.
translation.es: Debe haber alguien que te guste un poco.

translation.en: I don't know. I just guess I haven't really thought about it.
translation.es: No lo sé. Supongo que nunca lo pensé.

translation.en: Well, think about it.
And then maybe we can all go to homecoming together, like a double date thing.
translation.es: Tal vez podamos ir juntos al baileen una cita doble.

translation.en: -Hey, babe. -Hey!
Sorry I'm late.
-All good, babe. -[kissing]
Ugh. They both call each other "babe." Kill me right now.
Hey, Syd.
Do you think your mom could hook us up with some burgers?
They're just so great here.
Huh. She's not working today.
I was just asking. [laughs]
Okay.
[Dina] Want a burger, Brad? Let's get a burger. I've got some cash.
translation.es: ¿Quieres una hamburguesa?Vamos por una. Tengo dinero.

translation.en: -[Brad] Yeah? -Yeah.
-Wanna share one, babe? -Yeah. Oh, ketchup.
Help yourself.
So...
Dina's just great, isn't she?
[chuckling] Jesus, do you ever smile?
Not today.
[Dina] So, what have we decided?
Whatever you want, babe.
-Please. Please stop. -You gotta try one of these fries.
-I wish you would just stop talking. -[rumbling]
Wipe that smug smile off his stupid, stupid face.
translation.es: Quítate esa sonrisa engreída de la cara.

translation.en: -Oh, shit. -[Dina] Oh, my God.
Oh, fuck.
-[Dina] Are you okay? -Wait. What?
Yeah, fine. Just give me a minute.
-[Dina] Take a tissue. -[Brad] Gimme a minute, all right?
translation.es: Toma un pañuelo. Dame un minuto, ¿sí?

translation.en: So, here's the deal.
Today, I almost convinced myself that I made Bradley Lewis's nose bleed
translation.es: Hoy casi me convenzode que hice sangrar a Bradley Lewis

translation.en: with my mind.
Right.
Mostly, I just need to chill out more.
I am not losing my first and only very best friend ever.
translation.es: No perderé a mi primeray única mejor amiga.

translation.en: I'm happy for Dina,
and if dating Bradley Dickhead Lewis makes her happy,
translation.es: Si salir con el idiota de Bradley Lewisla hace feliz,

translation.en: then I guess I'm okay with it.
[boy] Oh, hey, Syd!
Hey.
He lives down the street from me.
translation.es: Vive en la misma calle que yo.

translation.en: Where I feel shitty about basically everything about myself,
translation.es: Mientras que yo me siento malpor todo lo que me pasa,

translation.en: Stan is the master of zero fucks.
translation.es: a Stan todo le importa un carajo.

translation.en: Oh, my leg fell asleep. One sec.
translation.es: Se me durmió la pierna, espera.

translation.en: Can I walk with you?
Sure. Why not?
Cool.
Cool.
Stan is kind of... weird.
You okay?
Shoes. Who needs 'em?
Uh... so, Bloodwitch, am I right?
What?
Bloodwitch. You like their music?
That's a... terrible name for a band.
translation.es: Es pésimo nombre para una banda.

translation.en: Nah. Perfect.
Bet they sound like shit.
Well, I mean, I have-- I have 'em on vinyl...
limited edition, gatefold and stuff,
if you wanna... come over, and we can listen sometime.
translation.es: Si quieres,puedes venir a escucharlo algún día.

translation.en: We can get high.
I have never been high before.
Yeah, maybe.
I mean, you don't have to.
I was-- I was just, you know... We-- You know, we live so close, and we've never really hung out before.
translation.es: Es solo que vivimos tan cercay nunca hemos pasado tiempo juntos.

translation.en: Uh, no, I guess we haven't.
But, yeah. Uh, maybe we should.
Yeah.
Cool. Uh...
Let me know.
What a world we live in, Sydney.
I live with my mom and little brother.
translation.es: Vivo con mi mamá y mi hermanito.

translation.en: [woman] Sydney! Is that you?
Mom and I haven't been getting along lately.
Nope. It's an axe murderer. Good thing you asked.
translation.es: No, soy una asesina.Suerte que preguntaste.

translation.en: Ha-ha! Very funny.
Hey. So apparently, Karen's dog ran through a screen door or something,
translation.es: Oye. Al parecer, el perro de Karenatravesó una puerta mosquitera o algo,

translation.en: so she had to go to an emergency vet.
translation.es: así que tuvo que ir a un veterinariode emergencia.

translation.en: -Okay. -So I'm gonna pick up her shift tonight,
translation.es: - Bueno.- Haré su turno esta noche.

translation.en: which is fine 'cause I owe her two shifts from the time Liam ate all that cheese.
translation.es: Está bien, porque le debo dos turnosde cuando Liam comió aquel queso.

translation.en: Well, thanks for telling me your life story, Mom.
translation.es: Gracias por contarmela historia de tu vida, mamá.

translation.en: No. Wait, come back here. I'm not done yet. Eyes on me.
translation.es: No, espera. Regresa.Aún no terminé. Mírame.

translation.en: Okay. Question. Big question.
Have you seen my stockings?
They were in the bathroom. They were hanging over the shower curtain?
translation.es: Estaban en el bañocolgadas sobre la ducha.

translation.en: Oh, sorry. I thought they were dirty.
-No, they were drying. -Well, I found them in the bathtub.
translation.es: - Se estaban secando.- Las encontré en la bañera.

translation.en: D-- Well, where are they? They're my last pair.
I sort of...
washed 'em.
Wait. In the washer?
Yeah, and I guess they sort of ended up in the dryer, so...
translation.es: Sí, y creo que terminaronen la secadora.

translation.en: Oh, great.
Now I get to feel like sausage while I'm serving it.
translation.es: Podré sentirme como una salchichamientras las sirvo.

translation.en: You don't really have to wear 'em, do you? No one wears 'em anymore.
translation.es: No tienes que usarlas, ¿o sí?Ya nadie las usa.

translation.en: -Like, since the '90s. -[sighs] Can you--
Can you just make sure that Liam does his homework and eats some dinner?
translation.es: ¿Puedes asegurarte de que Liamhaga su tarea y coma algo?

translation.en: Isn't he old enough to make sure himself?
Sydney, can you just do something for me, anything, just once, without questioning?
translation.es: ¿Puedes hacer algo por mí,solo una vez, sin cuestionarlo?

translation.en: Here I thought I was being so charming. Nope. Not even a little bit.
translation.es: - Pensé que estaba siendo encantadora.- No. Ni un poquito.

translation.en: Really doesn't matter what we're talking about.
-[door slams] -Mom and I could sit in silence
translation.es: Podríamos estar en silencioel resto de nuestras vidas

translation.en: for the rest of our lives, and she'd still annoy the crap out of me.
translation.es: Podríamos estar en silencioel resto de nuestras vidas e igual me irritaría como nada.

translation.en: Hey, Goob. Done your homework yet?
Hours ago.
Soon as I got home. What about you?
translation.es: En cuanto llegué a casa. ¿Y tú?

translation.en: Uh... I'll get to it.
Come on, Syd. Mom says you have to work hard if you're gonna succeed.
translation.es: Vamos, Syd. Mamá diceque debes esforzarte para tener éxito.

translation.en: Yeah, well, the plan's always been for me to sit back and watch you succeed, Goob.
translation.es: Bueno, el plan siempre fue sentarmey verte triunfar a ti, Tontis.

translation.en: Oh, hey, who knows?
Maybe one day, if you really work hard enough,
translation.es: Quizá algún día, si te esfuerzas mucho,

translation.en: you get to be the one to pay for my funeral.
translation.es: serás quien pague por mi funeral.

translation.en: -How was school today? -Well, um...
Richard Rynard punched Toby Gardner in the face,
translation.es: Richard Rynardgolpeó a Toby Gardner en la cara

translation.en: and he got sent to Mr. Coffee's office.
translation.es: y lo enviaron a la oficinadel señor Coffee.

translation.en: Oh, yeah?
Yup, and I think I might be next, so... I'm devising a plan. Check it out.
translation.es: Sí, y creo que le sigo yo,así que estoy ideando un plan. Mira.

translation.en: [Sydney] Holy shit, Goob. Is that for you?
[Liam] Yup. Designed it myself.
Breastplate, shin guards, spiked gloves...
But I'm not so sure about the helmet situation just yet,
translation.es: Aún no estoy seguro del casco.

translation.en: 'cause I don't wanna block my peripherals, you know, just in case.
translation.es: No quiero bloquearla visión periférica, por si acaso.

translation.en: It's really cool, man. It's some of your best work yet.
translation.es: Es genial, el mejor trabajo que has hecho.

translation.en: Yeah, it's basically my Mark One, and the first suit's always the hardest to design,
translation.es: Sí, es el primer traje que diseño,y el primero siempre es el más difícil,

translation.en: so it's still a work in progress.
translation.es: así que es un trabajo en proceso.

translation.en: And, sorry, what was the plan again?
Well, I'm gonna build the suit and kick Richard Rynard's ass.
translation.es: Voy a construir el trajey patearle el trasero a Richard Rynard.

translation.en: Oh. Vengeance.
Got it.
My family.
I guess we've never had a lot of money.
Like, every place we moved, and we've moved a lot,
translation.es: Todos los lugares adonde nos mudamos,y nos hemos mudado mucho,

translation.en: it's always some place like this.
translation.es: siempre son un lugar como este.

translation.en: It's like a lottery, I guess.
Some kids win big time the moment they're born.
translation.es: Algunos ganan a lo grande cuando nacen.

translation.en: The rest of us,
we're all stuck with scratch-offs and bottle caps and shit.
translation.es: debemos conformarnoscon raspaditas, tapitas y esas mierdas.

translation.en: -♪ To destroy that feeling ♪ -Liam?
Yeah?
If Richard Rynard ever touches you...
translation.es: Si Richard Rynard te hace algo

translation.en: before you get your suit built to kick his ass,
translation.es: antes de que construyas tu traje,

translation.en: I'll pull his throat out...
with my bare hands right in front of Mr. Coffee.
translation.es: con mis propias manosfrente al señor Coffee.

translation.en: Really?
Yeah. Yeah, like this.
-You are so weird. -[laughing]
Yeah, I know.
Okay, so... confession.
I started getting these zits on my thighs.
translation.es: Comencé a tener granos en los muslos.

translation.en: -I am straight up disgusting. -[water dripping]
I've tried zit cream and soap and all sorts of junk.
translation.es: Probé con crema y jabóny todo tipo de basura.

translation.en: Nothing helps.
-They're not even that fun to pop. -[rumbling]
[groans] Stop!
It's probably just puberty.
I don't know.
So, Stanley Barber texted me.
translation.es: Stanley Barber me envió un mensaje.

translation.en: -He made me listen to Bloodwitch. -[message alert]
translation.es: Me hizo escuchar a Bruja sangrienta.

translation.en: Sometimes at night, I want to touch myself,
translation.es: A veces por la noche, quiero tocarme,

translation.en: but I don't.
Peanut butter helps.
[Sydney] The later Mom gets home, the more wine she drinks.
translation.es: Cuanto más tarde llega mamá,más vino toma.

translation.en: What are we watching?
[muffled] Don't know.
[Sydney] We haven't talked about Dad since he killed himself in the basement.
translation.es: No hablamos de papádesde que se suicidó en el sótano.

translation.en: AC's broken.
The unit's probably just... overheated.
It's hot as balls in this house.
Open a window.
It's that heavy thing we're all too afraid to talk about.
translation.es: Es algo muy intensode lo que tenemos miedo de hablar.

translation.en: I got called in... to the counselor's office.
translation.es: Me llamaron a la oficina de la consejera.

translation.en: -Why? What did-- what did you do? -Nothing.
She just...
She wants me to have, like... an outlet or something.
translation.es: …quiere que tengauna forma de desahogo o algo así.

translation.en: An outlet for what?
Just, sometimes it feels like...
the people I love don't love me back.
translation.es: …que la gente que quiero no me quiere.

translation.en: Well... [sighs]
Maybe you're aiming too high, hon.
She's such a bitch sometimes.
Dad would have understood,
but he hung himself,
so I guess I'm on my own.
translation.es: así que supongo que estoy sola.

translation.en: Sometimes I wonder why he did it,
translation.es: A veces me pregunto por qué lo hizo

translation.en: and why we never talk about it...
translation.es: y por qué nunca hablamos de eso.

translation.en: ...and what the hell is going on with me.
Why sometimes I feel like I'm boiling inside.
translation.es: ¿Por qué a veces sientoque hiervo por dentro?

translation.en: 'Cause maybe...
...I am way more fucked up than I thought.
translation.es: ...estoy más jodida de lo que pensé.
